about.description:
click-repl turns a click-based application into a REPL, enabling
multiple commands to be executed in single session, with a single
shared context. Supports tab completion and command history.

name: click-repl
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "click-repl" %}
{% set version = "0.1.6" %}

package:
  name: "{{ name|lower }}"
  version: "{{ version }}"

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b9f29d52abc4d6059f8e276132a111ab8d94980afe6a5432b9d996544afa95d5

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - click
    - prompt_toolkit
    - python
    - six

test:
  imports:
    - click_repl

about:
  home: https://github.com/untitaker/click-repl
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: REPL plugin for Click
  description: |
    click-repl turns a click-based application into a REPL, enabling
    multiple commands to be executed in single session, with a single
    shared context. Supports tab completion and command history.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mcg1969
